languages.text: Впрочем, не он один. Разведчики обнаружили странные провалы в сугробах, окружающих корабль. Кажется, что кто-то наблюдал за судном, хоронясь в снегах, примерно в то же время, когда Ульфар Громогласный его обыскивал.

However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.
languages.original_text: Впрочем, не он один. Разведчики обнаружили странные провалы в сугробах, окружающих корабль. Кажется, что кто-то наблюдал за судном, хоронясь в снегах, примерно в то же время, когда Ульфар Громогласный его обыскивал.

traits.locale_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

languages.text: 然而，乌尔法当时并非孤身一人。侦察兵在飞船周围的雪地中发现了古怪的凹痕。看起来，在乌尔法·雷狼搜查飞船期间，似乎有人藏在雪里，监视着飞船的状况。
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: 然而，乌尔法当时并非孤身一人。侦察兵在飞船周围的雪地中发现了古怪的凹痕。看起来，在乌尔法·雷狼搜查飞船期间，似乎有人藏在雪里，监视着飞船的状况。

languages.text: しかしウルファーひとりではなかった。船を囲む雪壁に妙なへこみがあることに偵察部隊は気づく。何者かが雪に隠れられる場所からこの船を見張り、ほぼ同じタイミングで、ウルファー・サンダーラングはその人物を探していたようだ。
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: しかしウルファーひとりではなかった。船を囲む雪壁に妙なへこみがあることに偵察部隊は気づく。何者かが雪に隠れられる場所からこの船を見張り、ほぼ同じタイミングで、ウルファー・サンダーラングはその人物を探していたようだ。

languages.text: Sin embargo, no estaba solo. Los exploradores encuentran extrañas hendiduras en los montículos de nieve que rodean la nave. Parece que alguien la tenía vigilada mientras se escondía en la nieve, más o menos al mismo tiempo que Ulfar Pulmón Atronador la registraba.
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, no estaba solo. Los exploradores encuentran extrañas hendiduras en los montículos de nieve que rodean la nave. Parece que alguien la tenía vigilada mientras se escondía en la nieve, más o menos al mismo tiempo que Ulfar Pulmón Atronador la registraba.

languages.text: Cependant, il n'était pas seul. Les éclaireurs ont remarqué d'étranges affaissements dans les congères à proximité. Quelqu'un semble s'être caché dans la neige pour observer le vaisseau, à peu près au même moment où Ulfar procédait à sa fouille.
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, il n'était pas seul. Les éclaireurs ont remarqué d'étranges affaissements dans les congères à proximité. Quelqu'un semble s'être caché dans la neige pour observer le vaisseau, à peu près au même moment où Ulfar procédait à sa fouille.

languages.text: Allerdings war er nicht alleine. Die Späher finden seltsame Vertiefungen in den Schneeverwehungen rund um das Schiff. Anscheinend hat jemand das Schiff im Schnee vergraben beobachtet, etwa zur gleichen Zeit, als Ulfar Donnerlunge es durchsucht hat.
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: Allerdings war er nicht alleine. Die Späher finden seltsame Vertiefungen in den Schneeverwehungen rund um das Schiff. Anscheinend hat jemand das Schiff im Schnee vergraben beobachtet, etwa zur gleichen Zeit, als Ulfar Donnerlunge es durchsucht hat.

languages.text: Ancak yalnız değilmiş. Keşif erleri, geminin etrafındaki kar yığınlarında tuhaf çukurlar buldu. Görünüşe göre birisi, Ulfar Tufanciğer gemiyi ararken karlara yaslanıp onu izlemiş.
languages.original_text: However, he was not alone. The scouts find strange dips in the snowdrifts surrounding the ship. It seems that someone was watching the ship, from a position buried in the snow, around the same time that Ulfar Thunderlung was searching it.

traits.locale_text: Fakat yalnız değildi. Keşif erleri, geminin etrafındaki kar yığınlarında tuhaf çukurlar buldular. Görünüşe göre birisi, Ulfar Tufanciğer gemiyi ararken karlara gömülmüş bir pozisyondan onu izlemişti.
